name: PKShippingMethod
desc: An object that defines a shipping method for delivering physical goods.

items.name: var detail: String?
items.desc: A user-readable description of the shipping method.

items.name: var dateComponentsRange: PKDateComponentsRange?
items.desc: An expected range of delivery or shipping dates for a package, or the time range when an item is available for pickup.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: A unique identifier for the shipping method, used by the app.

items.name: class PKDateComponentsRange
items.desc: An object that specifies the start and end dates for a range of time.
